channel.title: Writing on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Negatives
item.description: I don’t have any training or skill in writing but I like ceratin aspects of it and sometimes try to explore there. The idea is to have a list where I can gradually put my accidental “images” that I like for some reason. I assume they can be “mine” but I’m not that sure in my memory to be certain. If they are in negative shades and obviously exagregated they should not feel too bad or emotionally costly I think because that is not the point.

item.title: Coffee for love
item.description: I have got to drinking only water couple of months ago. Before that I was a green-tea addict (only Flying Dragon). And lately there I got into a nice mix of starting 6-minute productivity diary, meditating, cutting obvious carbs, and listening to a nice episode of elated podcast episode about fighting demons and love for every being. And also to compensate a bit for carbs for starters I got to drink some diet soda.
